metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9904 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in lib\cdt\dttree.c in libcdt.a in graphviz 2.40.1.Stack consumption occurs because of recursive agclose calls inlib\cgraph\graph.c in libcgraph.a, related to agfstsubg inlib\cgraph\subg.c.

criterions.comment: graphviz: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
